title: Winnie Mandela dies at 81
text:
Winnie Mandela dies at 81 1:04pm EDT - 01:28 
Anti-apartheid activist Winnie Madikizela-Mandela, wife to Nelson Mandela during his decades of imprisonment, died on Monday, a family spokesman said. Rosanna Philpott reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Anti-apartheid activist Winnie Madikizela-Mandela, wife to Nelson Mandela during his decades of imprisonment, died on Monday, a family spokesman said. Rosanna Philpott reports.
